contentRequired: Content must be a string with at least 1 character
receiverInvalid: Receiver ID must be a valid Mongo ID
messageInvalid: Message ID must be a valid Mongo ID
reactionsArray: Reactions must be an array with a maximum of 1 item
reactionTypeInvalid: Reaction type must be a string
limitInvalid: Limit must be an integer greater than or equal to 1
pageInvalid: Page must be an integer greater than or equal to 1
toDateInvalid: To date must be a valid ISO8601 date
fromDateInvalid: From date must be a valid ISO8601 date
messagesArray: Messages must be an array with at least 1 item
messageIdInvalid: Message ID must be a valid Mongo ID
notificationIdInvalid: Notification ID must be a valid Mongo ID
sourceUserInvalid: Source User must be a valid Mongo ID
targetUserInvalid: Target User must be a valid Mongo ID
targetInvalid: Target must be a valid Mongo ID
watchedInvalid: Watched must be a boolean value
startDateInvalid: Start Date must be a valid ISO8601 date
endDateInvalid: End Date must be a valid ISO8601 date
